decision to pull out American forces and leave Saddam Hussein in power. Colin Powell and the other members of President Bush 's national security team agreed that the mission was to liberate Kuwait, not remove Saddam Hussein . There is a legitimate argument as to whether we stopped too soon. We accomplished the mission, Colin Powell said.`` President Bush made the right decision.'' The Iraqi leader was ousted in 2003 during the Iraq war, which started under President Bush 's son, former president President Bush W President Bush .

At Facebook, 26-year-old founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg calls the shots in an entrepreneurial culture that has enticed dozens of engineers to leave Google Inc. to work for the social networking company. My goal is to run Google Inc. at the pace and with the soul and passion of a startup, Page said in a Thursday interview.`` I think I will have time to do that given the way we have split up our responsibilities.''
